title: What if Riot deliberately made classic Kayle look terrible to encourage us buying skins?

replies.body: Very thot provoking my good man.

You opinion is that it is "deliberately terrible" 

That is not a shared opinion with me. 

But of course, everything Riot does HAS to be for the singular purpose of money right?

> [{quoted}](name=TheSnowyLeopard,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oJeRbNBi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-20T05:27:44.424+0000)
>
> You opinion is that it is "deliberately terrible" 
> 
> That is not a shared opinion with me. 
> 
> But of course, everything Riot does HAS to be for the singular purpose of money right?

Well, they're a company.

Everything they do *has* to involve money in some capacity.

> [{quoted}](name=TheSnowyLeopard,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oJeRbNBi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-20T05:27:44.424+0000)
>
> You opinion is that it is "deliberately terrible" 
> 
> That is not a shared opinion with me. 
> 
> But of course, everything Riot does HAS to be for the singular purpose of money right?

Don't worry, it's a bit of a meme, every decision Riot makes being geared towards making money
Why the "what if" in the title?
Well we have only seen the splash art and it's smoking hot.
